text: Ron Stallworth (born June 18, 1953) is a retired American police officer. He worked undercover to arrest members of the Ku Klux Klan in Colorado Springs, Colorado, in the late 1970s. He was the first African-American detective in the Colorado Springs Police Department. The 2018 movie BlacKkKlansman is based on his experiences. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:People from Colorado Springs, Colorado Category:African-American people Category:American police officers Category:American autobiographers Category:Writers from Colorado Category:Writers from Chicago
